title: BRIEF-SNC-Lavalin Says NouvLR General Partnership Reaches Contract Close On Réseau Express Métropolitain Project
text:
April 12, 2018 / 7:19 PM / Updated 19 minutes ago BRIEF-SNC-Lavalin Says NouvLR General Partnership Reaches Contract Close On Réseau Express Métropolitain Project Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 12 (Reuters) - SNC-Lavalin Group Inc: 
* SNC-LAVALIN, PART OF THE NOUVLR GENERAL PARTNERSHIP, HAS FINALIZED THE CONTRACT AGREEMENT RELATING TO THE ENGINEERING, PROCUREMENT AND CONSTRUCTION OF THE RÉSEAU EXPRESS MÉTROPOLITAIN 
* NOUVLR GENERAL PARTNERSHIP ENTERED INTO THE FIXED PRICE CONTRACT WORTH APPROXIMATELY $5 BILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
